content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the court made a final resolution regarding the matrimonial property of the parties involved the court recognized the applicants right to use a vehicle purchased through a car leasing contract and ordered them to continue making payments the court also declared the defendants debts to a bank and annulled a contract for the donation of immovable property the movable property acquired during the marriage was divided with the applicant receiving certain items and the defendant being ordered to pay half of their value the court also ordered the defendant to pay a sum of money to the applicant for payments made towards a car leasing contract both parties were ordered to pay certain costs and the state was also entitled to receive payment for proceedings the court dissolved the marriage due to faults committed by both spouses the defendant is obligated to fulfill the car leasing contract while the applicant has the right to continue paying the installments and eventually take ownership of the car the defendant owes debts to a bank and must pay the applicant for payments made on the car leasing contract both parties are responsible for their own costs and they must also pay the state

metadata.cost: 240 EUR (legal fees) + 3.50 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant 204.20 EUR (legal fees) + 98 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant
